item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

can some1 make it so the player you are fighting does the gfx ? gfx is 293

case 15443: // whip white if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(293); } c.gfx0(398); c.specDamage = 1.50; c.specAccuracy = 6.0; c.startAnimation(1658); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

Read full topic
